title: Joe Swash is thrown up on by baby Rex ahead of Dancing On Ice appearance
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Joe Swash is getting used to being a dad again.

The I'm A Celeb star took to Instagram to share a light-hearted photo of him and his five month old baby, Rex.

In the snap, the front of Joe's shirt can be seen dripping with little Rex's vomit.

Joe, who shares Rex with Loose Woman Stacey Solomon, captioned the cute pic: "One of us has been a bit sick!!! And Rex looks a bit guilty to me??"

Adorable Rex stares wide-eyed and open-mouhted at the camera.

Fans have been loving the picture, with one writing: "Look at Rex's face haha It wasn't ME!! so cute."

Another laughed: "He has the best expressions!!"

(Image: Instagram)

A third questioned whether Rex was actually the guilty party, writing "Always blame the kid" with a cry laughing emoji.

A fourth gushed over baby Rex: "He looks so big already, he has the funniest expressions, bless such a cutie x."

He has another son, 12 year-old Harry, with ex Emma Sophocleous.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Matt Frost/REX)

Stacey, meanwhile, has 11 year-old Zachary with Dean Cox, and seven year-old Leighton, with Aaron Barham.

Cheeky chappy Joe is set to don his skates for the upcoming series of Dancing On Ice.

With the milestone announcement that the show would be featuring a same-sex dancing couple, Joe took to Instagram to joke that he would be one half of it.

In reality, Steps singer Ian "H" Watkins will be taking to the ice with American pro Matt Evers.

(Image: Instagram)

Joe laughed: "I know you've all heard the news.

"Yes - Dancing On Ice's going to have its first male couple. I'm going to to be dancing with H!

"Can you believe it? I can't wait! I mean, I'm a bit worried about the head banger, but so excited!"

On the landmark decision to include same-sex couples, a source told The Sun : "After conversations with the dancing On Ice production team, H enquired as to the possibility of being paired with a male pro skater.

"Bosses at Dancing On Ice are fully supportive of a same-sex partnership, so this year H will be paired with Matt.

"It's a huge moment in TV history. A lot of viewers will be watching and the hope is it might set a trend."
description: Joe was vomited on by five month old baby Rex and the little man pulls an adorable face at the camera
